name: Budding ASP.NET Developer
short_description:
I'm a community college student.

I'm looking to make projects, something to show a potential employer after I get my degree and certifications that not only do I know about the theory and applications of modern programming techniques---but I've done them.

I have "Beginning ASP.NET 3.5 in C# and VB" from Wrox Publishers, and I'm going to just do this chapter by chapter.  If I'm doing something wrong, or someone sees a better way of doing it, by all means, throw it out there.

Nothing mind-boggling or earth-shattering here.  I will complete the exercises in the book, and maybe add other projects that I find along the way so that I have a consolidated portfolio to show an employer---and if someone else can use any source code created here, go for it.

If there are any developers reading this, please; your knowledge and experience is welcomed and greatly appreciated! Thank you!
summary: Just looking to make a mess and figure out how to clean it up.
